name: Slime Fidget Trading Simulator
description:
A Slime Simulator with ASMR, fidget, realistic, satisfying, super ANTI stress slimes!



You can stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it, swirl it and poke it. This Slime Simulator feels exactly like the real thing!



How to play:
- Stretch, press, and poke the Slime right on your device.



Features:
- Ready-made slime with lots of colors and sounds.
- Moments of relaxation and meditation.
-ASMR engagement.
